column3: Concept ACK for fixing a bug by removing code. Didn't look at the changes, though.

Concept NACK. We still want to do file range allocation (edit: using the built-in functionality) ~~even~~ on macs. However, it looks like we are using the `F_PREALLOCATE` function incorrectly.

From the manpage:
```man
     The position modes (fst_posmode) for the F_PREALLOCATE command indicate how to use the offset field.  The modes are as follows:

           F_PEOFPOSMODE   Allocate

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.
